title: Kimberley Complete - 4WD Journey
inclusions_evidence: 15-day escorted tour with APT from Broome return, twin share.
41 meals PLUS add international flights & comprehensive Travel Insurance
Included helicopter flight over Mitchell Falls

other.notes: DIY costs for meals and helicopter flight are not provided.

reasoning: The deal offers a comprehensive tour with significant inclusions, but lacks clear DIY pricing for flights and accommodations, making it difficult to assess savings accurately.
additional_notes: The deal includes exclusive savings and a well-structured itinerary, enhancing its value.
